mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, MESSAGEID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, DESCR, SENDER, ITEMID, FLAGED, IFREAD, CREATEDATE, RECEIVEDATE, SENDTONAME, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, STYPE, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, ORDERID, STATUS, FOLDERID, FOLDERNAME, OPER, OPERTIME, ANSWER, UPDATEFLAG, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPERTYPE from DB_EBAYMESSAGELOG where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
